title: How to Play Kaizo Mario World

steps.title: Download WinRAR.
steps.content: Download WinRAR. You need it to extract the files that you'll be downloading.

steps.title: Download an SNES emulator.
steps.content: Download an SNES emulator. The best ones are ZNES and SNES9X; either of which you can find by searching online.

steps.title: Download a Super Mario World ROM.
steps.content: Download a Super Mario World ROM. You can download one by searching for a site with a ROM.

steps.title: Go to this website and click on the "Kaizo Mario -- Kaizo Mario 2 -- and Lunar IPS" link to download the necessary files.
steps.content: Go to this website and click on the "Kaizo Mario -- Kaizo Mario 2 -- and Lunar IPS" link to download the necessary files. There's also a link to Kaizo Mario 3 if you want to play that game.

steps.title: After the folder is finished downloading, extract it.
steps.content: After the folder is finished downloading, extract it. Open the folder when it's done.

steps.title: Click on the "Lunar IPS" file to open the program.
steps.content: Click on the "Lunar IPS" file to open the program.

steps.title: Click on "Apply IPS Patch" and select the Kaizo Mario or Kaizo Mario 2 ROM.
steps.content: Click on "Apply IPS Patch" and select the Kaizo Mario or Kaizo Mario 2 ROM. Then, when it prompts you for the original file, select the Super Mario World file to apply the hack.

steps.title: Open the emulator and select the Kaizo Mario or Kaizo Mario 2 ROM to play the game.
steps.content: Open the emulator and select the Kaizo Mario or Kaizo Mario 2 ROM to play the game.
